data.name: Paratopic Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The Paratopic: Definitive Cut Soundtrack includes all the original compositions written and produced for the game by composer & sound designer Chris I. Brown, alias BeauChaotica/Lazarus Audio. Remastered to stand on their own outside the game, this is the Special Edition of the OST, originally only available as a bonus purchase on itch, and consists of two collections.

The Standard Edition Files form the main soundtrack. The Special Edition Files include additional un-used demo versions of in-game tracks, the radio broadcasts in full (with a much clearer signal!), and a couple of other goodies. Files are provided in mp3 and FLAC.

Full Tracklist:

Standard Edition Files:
1. Paratopic (Menu Theme)
2. Interrogation
3. The Diner
4. The Hub
5. Open All Hours
6. Urban Dreamscape (Apartments Theme)
7. Birdwatcher’s Theme
8. Birdwatcher’s Intrusion
9. Assassin’s Theme
10. The Future Is Bright

Special Edition Files:
1. Paratopic Trailer
2. Apartments FX Demo
3. Birdwatch Demo 1
4. Birdwatch Demo 2
5. Forecourt Shadow
6. Assassin’s Theme Early Mix
7. TV Head
8. Paratopic Radio – Channel 1 – ParaTalk
9. Paratopic Radio – Channel 2 – Carlos AM

The Soundtrack will be placed in your Paratopic: Definitive Cut Folder in the Steam Directory:
…Steam/steamapps/common/ParatopicAM001/Soundtrack

data.short_description: The Paratopic: Definitive Cut Soundtrack includes all the original compositions written and produced for the game by composer & sound designer Chris I. Brown.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo Q8300 @ 2.5GB
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 630 2GB DDR3
  • Storage: 583 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard Sound
  • Additional Notes: You can find the soundtrack files in your game's installation directory.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or Higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 630 or Higher
  • Storage: 583 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard Sound
  • Additional Notes: You can find the soundtrack files in your game's installation directory.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS 10.10
  • Processor: 2.26 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9400M 256MB
  • Storage: 583 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard Sound
  • Additional Notes: You can find the soundtrack files in your game's installation directory.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS 10.14
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.7 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Graphics 6100
  • Storage: 583 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard Sound
  • Additional Notes: You can find the soundtrack files in your game's installation directory.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or SteamOS+
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo Q8300 @ 2.5GB
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 630 2GB DDR3
  • Storage: 407 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard Sound
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or SteamOS+

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
